## PaypalExpressTokenInput interface

Defines the attributes required to receive a payment token for Express Checkout and Payments Standard payment methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PaypalExpressTokenInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cart\_id](./magento-api.paypalexpresstokeninput.cart_id.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The unique ID that identifies the customer's cart |
|  [code](./magento-api.paypalexpresstokeninput.code.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | Payment method code |
|  [express\_button?](./magento-api.paypalexpresstokeninput.express_button.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the buyer selected the quick checkout button. The default value is false |
|  [urls](./magento-api.paypalexpresstokeninput.urls.md) | [PaypalExpressUrlsInput](./magento-api.paypalexpressurlsinput.md) | A set of relative URLs that PayPal uses in response to various actions during the authorization process |
|  [use\_paypal\_credit?](./magento-api.paypalexpresstokeninput.use_paypal_credit.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the buyer clicked the PayPal credit button. The default value is false |
